name: Edvard Sills' Adventures - Episode 2 (browser play)
description:
Edvard Sills' Adventures - Episode 2 (browser play)

You play as Edvard Sills, a real historical person. He was the son of a Norwegian judge and a female slave in the Danish-Norwegian colony of St. Croix in the Caribbean. 10 years old he survived a dramatic shipwreck in the Oslofjord. In this episode he has to stop smugglers bringing goods illegally into Norway.

NB: This game is currently only in Norwegian.  NB 2: This is considered a pilot/beta test.

Want to download this game instead? Here's the downloads page: https://tidvis.itch.io/edvard-sills-episode-2
